code: import{useEffect}from"react";import{useSelector}from"react-redux";import{Howl}from"howler";export var usePlaySound=function usePlaySound(url,isPlaying,gameOver){var level=arguments.length>3&&arguments[3]!==undefined?arguments[3]:.5;var isMute=useSelector(function(store){return store.isMute.value;});useEffect(function(){if(isMute)return;var bgSound=new Howl({src:[url],volume:level,loop:true});if(isPlaying){if(gameOver){return function(){return bgSound.stop();};}bgSound.play();}return function(){bgSound.stop();};},[url,isPlaying,gameOver,level,isMute]);return null;};
